content: Mainstream adoption of Claude Code by non-engineering teams at @tryramp has been significant in the last six weeks, with 80% of PMs, 70% of compliance, and 55% of the finance team using it.

AI tools will fundamentally change what is possible for non-engineering roles, as evidenced by the progression of #helpdata interactions: from data team troubleshooting (2021-2024) to data team using AI for troubleshooting (2024-2025), to analysts using AI themselves and identifying solutions (Jan 2026), to analysts submitting PRs directly (Feb 2026).

At Ramp, non-engineering teams are already performing tasks traditionally done by data professionals: the finance team ships SQL, the product team conducts causal analysis, and the design and engineering team builds KPI dashboards.
